professional Oracle Database Administrator with knowledge on Microsoft Sql Server database I Have 6 years of extensive knowledge and proficiency in Oracle database administration I have worked on very large production database ranging from 400GB to 8TB performing different types of DBA roles such as configurationinstallations management protection which can be security backup and recovery respectively Experience in Implementation of different database high availability solutions like RAC DATAGUARD and GOLDEN GATE across multiple platforms like LINUX Solaris UNIX and Windows I have Proactively monitored and tuned system available resources to keep the performance of our databases at its peak using different type of tools and at different levels I have complete SDLC knowledge I have worked on Oracle 10g 11g and 12c versions I am an enthusiastic proactive team player who is fast at picking up new technology with great attention to detail as well as great communicationdocumentation skills I have strong aptitude to analyze and resolve problems I have a profound ability to adapt and thrive in a dynamic fast paced and challenging work environment I have the ability to work in versatile environments whether it would be single or teambased roles with limited direction I can proficiently articulate technical concepts to a variety of technical and Cox Communications Atlanta GA May 2013 to August 2016 Exposure to SQL Tuning Advisor SQL Profiles SQL Monitoring SQL Access Advisor SQL Baselines and SQL Tuning Advisor tools and utilities Used TKPROF
